TextView.android:text: 1 Brief Forms After this group, you have only four more groups to learn.
*The outline for over is written above the following shorthand stroke. It is also used as a prefix form, as in:
2 Def, Dif By rounding off the angle between d-f, we obtain the fluent def, dif blend.
3 Div, Dev The stroke that represents def, dif also represents div and dev.
4 Ea, Ia The sounds of ea, as in create, and ia, as in piano, are represented by a large circle with a dot placed within it.
To (preposition) In the direction of. (To is also the sign of the infinitive
I gave the book to Kay. \n I will go back to work in May 15.
I, too, have a college degree. \n You make too many telephone calls.
I will need two days to finish the job.
